document_data.name: Herath
document_data.mainbody: '''Herath''' was a city located in central [[Dambrath]].
document_data.Geography: Located along the [[Dolphin's Climb]] river just south of the [[Gnollwatch Mountains]], Herath was a bustling city.
document_data.History: Easily the richest city in all of Dambrath, Herath held the nation's state mints for [[electrum]] and [[silver]] coins.
document_data.Defense: The city sported an army composed of 500 cavalry and 2,500 infantry. They spent much of their time guarding the precious mines that were the lifeblood of the city. In addition to these troops, Duchess [[Selanith L'baros]] had a personal guard of 1,000 [[gnolls]] and 40 [[hill giant]]s.
document_data.Inhabitants: Nearly all of the [[dwarves]] in Dambrath lived in Herath.
